name: Rock Paper Potions
description:
No Rocks, No Paper, and Only Four Potions...

but that's all you need to win in this luck-based, rock-paper-scissors-like game!

Combine potions to make monsters, then have them fight others! First to 5 points wins!

Made in one week for the Acorn Game Jam with the theme "Artificial Life" and the twist of "Only Four"
